mapper.select: SELECT WORKCODE,GUIDE,EQUIP,MEASURE,NAME AS WORKNAME FROM WORK_LIST WORK JOIN CODE_LIST CODE ON WORK.WORKCODE = CODE.CODE WHERE WORKCODE = #{workCode} ORDER BY WORKCODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORK_LIST(WORKCODE, GUIDE, EQUIP, MEASURE) VALUES (#{workCode}, #{guide}, #{equip}, #{measure} )
